review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: How present were you yesterday? Did you notice some of your choice points - moments
  when you began going into old thinking patterns or behaviors? At those moments, were you able to remember a
  more effective approach that you are holding an intention about? This puts you on The Path and supports the
  development of new brain pathways.
quote: "Noticing choice points in your day can change your life" Stephen Sideroff, PhD

step_of_the_day.title: Staying focused on growth. Being aware of your choices (Pillars #1-9)
step_of_the_day.content:
I have been emphasizing the notion of choice points throughout your day. Places in which you typically
  follow your old ways of thinking and doing - your habit patterns. When you set an intention for healthier
  ways of proceeding - based on your healthy internal parent - it helps you notice these choice points. While
  the goal is to make new choices, sometimes this is still difficult. But what can be possible is simply
  having the awareness of these choice points and the inappropriateness of the old pattern.

action_step:
Today, let's set the goal of simply being aware of the choice points in your day. Those moments in which you
  automatically think negatively, are self-critical or avoid taking a necessary action. Awareness is a
  powerful tool in and of itself. It helps you face life instead of withdrawing or avoiding. So today notice
  your choice points.
journal_entry: Write about your choice points and what you feel at those moments.
